page.title: 03EDUCATION _ WORTHEN SCHOOL
page.content: The present village school was built in 1851 and opened in 1853 ,it was extended in 1907,and temporary buildings were put up in 1946.There are{ three teachers }on staff and { {five}kitchen,cleaning and office people.There have been an average of {53 children} in the school for the past five years.This year 1985 a {new {school building}is being built next to the village hall.Children travel up to five miles each way to attend the school,they are carried by contract mini-bus . The youngest children are 4 years 8 months old and the oldest 11 years 3 months.Children usually transfer to the Mary Webb Comprehensive School in the September before they are 12.
